author: Nitin Govindan
title: Anyone travelling to tawng this weekend 21 Aug15
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Arunachal Pradesh » Anyone travelling to tawng this weekend 21 Aug15 Anyone travelling to tawng this weekend 21 Aug15 # 1 Hi IM, I am backpacking to Tawang this weekend which is 21st Aug and I will be reaching Guawahati on the same date. I get an idea from this amazing site on the way to reach Tawang despite the rain and the risks but while at Tawang, hiring a cab alone for visits would be super costly. Would there be anyone who would like to join so that I can share hotel/cab costs, Love,
